comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Must be a multi-tasker -- notice the bugle strung on his shoulder.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: L. S. in the photo caption stands for "Life Saving."

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: No, that's a bugle, with a double coil.  Speaking trumpets are straight.  Makes sense that he would use it for signaling, though.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Whoa -- I hadn't noticed the coil before. You're right, that's gotta be a bugle. For playing reveille near unconscious ears, perhaps.
